title: Cirque Du Freak
description: This is the complete 12 book collection for the series Cirque Du Freak. This collection includes the following titles - Killers Of The Dawn, Lord Of The Shadows, Trials Of Death, Sons Of Destiny, Living Nightmare, Vampire's Assistant, Tunnels Of Blood, Vampire Prince, Hunters Of The Dusk, Vampire Mountain, Lake Of Souls, Allies Of The Night
author: Darren Shan
